scripts.build: cat source.js | uglifyjs -c unused=false | tee minified.js | jscrush > crushed.js && sed -e '/SUB/r source.js' < shim.html > index.html && wc -c *.js
scripts.webgl: cat webgl2.js | uglifyjs -c unused=false | tee minified.js | jscrush > crushed.js && sed -e '/SUB/r crushed.js' < shim.html > index.html && wc -c *.js
